page.title: 16Recreation of Rawmarsh Youth
page.content:
The sample was 150 children aged 12-15
{>1/W 1/W 1/M <1/M N {SWIMMING BATHS }13 60 22 41 14 {LEISURE CENTRE }5 13 36 59 37 {CLUBS (VARIOUS) }8 21 36 30 55 {YOUTH CLUBS }16 34 16 35 49 {THEATRES }1 0 2 42 105 {CINEMAS }2 1 37 89 21 {DISCOS }10 19 23 41 57
KEY:{>1/W}= Used more than once a week {1/W}= Used about once a week {1/M}= Used about once a month {<1/M}= Used less than the above {N}= Never used
Amenities desired:{ICE RINK}(16);{BMX {CYCLE TRACK}(7);{AMUSEMENT ARCADES}(8) Leisure activities:{SPORT}(66);{T.V.} (26);{BMX CYCLING}(16);{COMPUTERS}(16) {READING}(14);{FISHING}(12);{MUSIC}(11)
